Dubai Harbour

View of the Cruise Terminal
v

Box Park

View of the Cruise Terminal

Project Detail

  • Retail
  • Food & Beverage
  • Hospitality
  • Residential
  • Marina
  • Cruiseship Terminal

Dubai Harbour will include commercial, residential, transport and community facility land uses. Shamal envisions the Dubai Harbour to be an iconic and innovative waterfront development that will positively contribute to Dubai’s maritime and tourism sector with its world class marina and cruise terminal..

This development will be located along King Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud street, between JBR and Palm Jumeirah and will provide connections to nearby attractions including Skydive Dubai, Dubai International Marine Club and Dubai Marina via new transport connections.

Visit Site

  • Site Area

    1,069,682sqm

  • Yacht Capacity

    1,072+

  • Completion

    2020

Location

Located between the Palm Jumeirah and the shores of the Jumierah Area, Dubai Harbour is primed to become the new “it” development in Dubai.

Site Layout

The Dubai Harbour Master Plan brings together a series of unique character zones into an overall vision making it a distinctive landmark destination to compete with developments in its immediate surrounding. A series of seven distinct zones are proposed to bring together the overall vision of the development. Each area has its own character and activities. The uses identified relate to each zone’s unique attributes.

Next Project

Jumierah Bay
